text: @SenSherrodBrown Another Democrat screaming everyone is going to die even though the death rate of Covid-19 is still less than .5%. You know you can’t sell vote by mail if everyone is back to work next week. Essential workers seem to be smart enough to know how to stay safe, why not the Senate
